SEARCH
Package nl.pim16aap2.util.reflection

Class ReflectionBuilder

java.lang.Object
nl.pim16aap2.util.reflection.ReflectionBuilder
public final class ReflectionBuilder extends Object
Contains several static methods to easily perform several types of complicated reflection lookups.
Author:
Pim

    • findClass

      @CheckReturnValue @Contract(pure=true) public static ClassFinder findClass()
      Returns:
      A new ClassFinder.

    • findClass

      @CheckReturnValue @Contract(pure=true) public static ClassFinder findClass(String... names)
      Creates a new ClassFinder and configures it with a set of class names.
      Parameters:
      names - A list of class names to search for. There should be at least one.
      Returns:
      A new ClassFinder.

    • findConstructor

      @CheckReturnValue @Contract(pure=true) public static ConstructorFinder findConstructor()
      Creates a new ConstructorFinder.
      Returns:
      A new ConstructorFinder.

    • findConstructor

      @CheckReturnValue @Contract(pure=true) public static ConstructorFinder.ConstructorFinderInSource findConstructor(Class<?> source)
      Creates a new ConstructorFinder and specifies the class the Constructor should exist in.
      Parameters:
      source - The class in which the finder will look for the Constructor.
      Returns:
      A new ConstructorFinder.

    • findField

      @CheckReturnValue @Contract(pure=true) public static FieldFinder findField()
      Creates a new FieldFinder.
      Returns:
      A new FieldFinder.

    • findField

      @CheckReturnValue @Contract(pure=true) public static FieldFinder.FieldFinderInSource findField(Class<?> source)
      Creates a new FieldFinder.FieldFinderInSource and configures the class the Field should exist in.
      Parameters:
      source - The class in which the finder will look for the Field.
      Returns:
      A new FieldFinder.FieldFinderInSource.

      Returns:
      A new MethodFinder.

      @CheckReturnValue @Contract(pure=true) public static MethodFinder.MethodFinderInSource findMethod(Class<?> source)
      Creates a new MethodFinder.MethodFinderInSource and configures the class the Method should exist in.
      Parameters:
      source - The class in which the finder will look for the Method.
      Returns:
      A new MethodFinder.MethodFinderInSource.

      A new EnumValuesFinder.

    • findEnumValues

      @CheckReturnValue @Contract(pure=true) public static EnumValuesFinder findEnumValues(Class<?> source)
      Creates a new EnumValuesFinder and configures the enum class they should exist in.
      Parameters:
      source - The class in which the finder will look for the enum values.
      Returns:
      A new EnumValuesFinder.
